name: Fanfiction.net Tweaks
description:
Undoes a number of "improvements" added on the June 5th site update.

∙removes excess space/margins on the sides of all pages and recolors them from grey to white
∙removes avatars/story covers from the summaries shown on story pages
∙removes banner and square ads from story and profile pages 
∙restores purple color to already-visited hyperlinks
∙restores default font type to Verdana rather than Arial
∙removes minimum story content width restrictions, allowing narrow windows without scrolling
additional_info: I should preface this by saying that honestly, I have no idea what I'm doing. This is simply my attempt to fiddle things into something closer to the readable page FF.net used to have, and I thought I might as well share the result with someone else who might be interested. I can make no guarantees that this will work for all users or that I'll be able to help anyone with a problem, but I'm certainly willing to give it a shot. I am also more than willing to try to implement something additional if there's a request for it, but as I've mentioned, I barely know what I'm doing. I can only promise to try. 6.8.12 Version 1.0 ∙removes excess space/margins on the sides of all pages and recolors them from grey to white ∙removes avatars/story covers from the summaries shown on story pages ∙removes banner and square ads from story and profile pages (or at least most of them, I think) 8.4.12 Version 1.1 ∙restores purple color to already-visited hyperlinks 8.6.12 Version 1.2 ∙restores default font type to Verdana rather than Arial 3.27.13 Version 1.3 ∙removes minimum story content width restrictions, allowing narrow windows without scrolling 3.23.15 Version 1.4 ∙updated adblock containers ∙removed code for tiny text & Share link removal at bottom (no longer visually distracting)
